title: A Promise and a Warning
summary: Genesis 18 describes God’s visit to Abraham, promising that Sarah will bear a son. God also reveals His plan to judge Sodom and Gomorrah. Abraham intercedes, asking God to spare the city for the sake of the righteous.

faq.question: What was Sarah’s reaction to God’s promise?
faq.answer: She laughed because she was old and past childbearing age.

faq.question: Why did Abraham plead for Sodom?
faq.answer: He was concerned for the righteous people living there, including his nephew Lot.
